definitions.definition: A touch with the lips, usually to express love or affection, or as a greeting.
An 'X' mark placed at the end of a letter or other type of message.
A type of filled chocolate candy, shaped as if someone had kissed the top. See Hershey's Kisses.

definitions.example: We sat behind an obnoxiously kissy couple in the cinema.

definitions.definition: Suited to kissing; resembling or relating to kissing.
